actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for the extended availability of data from any superseded consumer price index by requiring the Secretary of Labor to continue to publish such superseded index for 60 months.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Labor, upon the revision of any consumer price index, to continue to publish the superseded index for the following five years.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the extended availability of data from any superseded consumer price index by requiring the Secretary of Labor to continue to publish such superseded index for 60 months.
